request.description: Get detailed statistics for a tweet including top likers
Toggle like/unlike status for a tweet (convenient alternative to separate like/unlike endpoints)
Get current authenticated user's profile with statistics
Search for users by username or bio content
Get any user's public profile by username
Getuser's activity feed (tweets and likes) - only accessible by the user themselves
